title: Game won't launch on Mac
body:
I for some reason have two League of Legends applications.
League of Legends takes up 6.43GB
and League of Legends2 takes up 5.6GB

The first one will just "bounce" once when I click on it.
The second one will open up the client before the login screen. It will say it needs to update and say Step 1/2: Updating Interface | 1638MB (913KBs). After 5 minutes it will say there was an error and close out.

What should I do?

replies.body:
Are you on the PBE? One could be the PBE client specifically. If not, I'd recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then completing  clean reinstall of League. Simply boot up the app, check the boxes for *Reinstall* and *Clean uninstall*, then launch the client after the reinstall to finish the patching process.

Let me know if this helped.
